div.head: Letter to Townie
div.p:
It is needless for me to speak of the many happy moments, which we have enjoyed together; suffice it to say, that if Memory does not prove a recreant to his duty! Years may roll away - ocean's mooring roar may serve as a barrier to our companionship-. Yet, be assured that you, and your , will never be . You have been to me a "friend indeed", and is my nature as cold and as to lose sight of my friends? No Towns I can think of them! I will remember you. Life has many - they are - so be guarded - be your own skiff, with Christ Jesus at the helm, and then, the storm may rage - to be bunnies is a noting you would seem to be your partner - met with the "Lord save us, or me punish" of Jimmy PeterPeter, Jimmy.
